itunes:title: 20 The Amazons - Part 2
title: 20 The Amazons - Part 2
description:
The legend is that, around 1250 BCE, an army of Amazon women attacked Athens. Plutarch, who lived in the first century CE, tells us that in his time at Athens there were still graves of warrior women, temples dedicated to them, and a neighborhood called Amazoneum. I'm a believer. Are you?

New episodes every Monday

Subscribe wherever you get your podcasts
content:encoded:
